title: D-Wade and Shaq React to Draymond Green's Comments About Players On the Trading Block | NBA on TNT
author: NBA on TNT
description:
Dwyane Wade and Shaq react to Draymond Green's comments about the treatment of players like Andre Drummond and Blake Griffin who are on the trading block.  

Watch highlights from Inside the NBA with Shaq, Charles Barkley, Kenny Smith and Ernie Johnson and more! Subscribe now to be updated on the latest videos: https://www.youtube.com/nbaontnt?sub_confirmation=1

Connect with NBA on TNT:
Follow NBA on TNT on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NBAonTNT
Like NBA on TNT on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NBAONTNT/
Follow NBA on TNT on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nbaontnt/?hl=en

localize.description:
德怀恩-韦德和沙克对德雷蒙德-格林关于安德烈-德拉蒙德和布雷克-格里芬等处于交易区的球员待遇的评论做出了回应。 

请观看Inside the NBA的精彩片段，包括Shaq、Charles Barkley、Kenny Smith和Ernie Johnson等。立即订阅以获得最新的视频：https://www.youtube.com/nbaontnt?sub_confirmation=1。
